articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: G20 close to agreement on admitting African Union, unlikely to change name to G21 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The inclusion of African Union, a bloc of 55 countries, in G20 is expected to give African countries a greater say in tackling global challenges | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: The G20 states have moved closer to an agreement on admitting the African Union (AU) as a member of the grouping, with an announcement expected during the summit to be hosted by India over… [+3244 chars]
